remarks: Closure of the multiplication operation of a ring.  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringi.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringi.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
ringi.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
rngocl $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A H B ) e. X ) $.
